Name: Tarte Tatin Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Separately, SHAKE cream and egg white with ice and strain back into shaker.
Carefully pour over back of spoon so as to LAYER over cocktail.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: A creamy top hides a vanilla, apple and caramel combo. Inspired by the dessert created by the Tatin sisters, a tart of caramelised apples cooked under a pastry lid.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Tarte Tatin Cocktail contains 295 calories
